page.title: 11 Children's Street Games
page.content:
{Â£British Bulldog'} is popular with both boys & girls.Children line up against a wall or fence,there is one person Â£on', who shouts out someones name. The person whose name is called shouts Â£Bulldog'& everyone runs.The person who is Â£on'tries to catch everyone else and whoever is caught helps the other person. This is repeated over & over again until everyone is caught.
{Â£Sticky Glue'} There is one person Â£on' The other players hold on to her outstretched fingers. The person 'on' calls out a subject and tells a story. If she mentions the subject the players run to the other side and the one who is touched is Â£on' next.
